title: Бгаґава̄н Шрīла Бгакті Сіддга̄нта Сарасватī Тха̄кур
author: Шрīла Бгакті Ракшак Шрīдгар Дев-Ґосва̄мī Маха̄ра̄дж

translation: “In the great Gauḍīya Vaiṣṇava teachers’ line,<br class="SongVerse__break" />as Śrīla Bhakti Siddhānta Saraswatī he’s renowned.<br class="SongVerse__break" />Like the radiant sun in the morning sky,<br class="SongVerse__break" />he appeared to rescue all souls swallowed by<br class="SongVerse__break" />the all-devouring impersonal philosophy.<br class="SongVerse__break" />By spreading the teachings of Lord Gaurāṅga<br class="SongVerse__break" />to sing the Holy Name of Lord Śrī Krishna,<br class="SongVerse__break" />he gave all the chance to dive in the ocean <br class="SongVerse__break" />of love of Śrī Krishna, the Supreme Person.<br class="SongVerse__break" />Śrīla Bhakti Siddhānta, my lord, divine master —<br class="SongVerse__break" />at his feet do I pray to serve him forever.”
